meanings.definition: A defensive player in American football positioned behind the defensive linemen.
meanings.sent1: The linebacker tackled the running back before he could reach the end zone.
meanings.sent2: The team's linebacker intercepted the pass and ran it back for a touchdown.
meanings.sent3: The linebacker joked that he had eyes in the back of his head to see the plays coming.
meanings.sent4: She was a linebacker on the field, always ready to defend her team from any attack.
meanings.sent5: The linebacker's speed and agility made him a formidable opponent on the field.

meanings.definition: A person who plays the position of linebacker in football.
meanings.sent1: My brother is a linebacker for the high school football team.
meanings.sent2: The linebacker's dedication to training paid off with a spot on the college team.
meanings.sent3: The linebacker proudly wore his team jersey to show his position on the field.
meanings.sent4: She admired the linebacker's strength and determination during the game.
meanings.sent5: The young linebacker aspired to play professionally and make a name for himself in the sport.
